rooms.description: Entry hall with natural light and ventilation.
Spacious living area with large windows for ample daylight.
Functional dining space adjoining the kitchen.
Efficient layout with storage and ventilation in accordance with local norms.
Compact quarters for servants that adhere to budget constraints while ensuring privacy.
Spacious bedroom with balcony and optimal east-facing orientation for natural light.
Second bedroom with balcony, aligned to north-east to comply with Vastu principles.

additional_features.vastu_considerations: The master bedroom is placed in the north-east corner to attract positive energy. The living room is oriented towards the east for a welcoming entrance and abundant sunlight. Balconies on both bedrooms provide privacy and light, aligning with Vastu principles.
additional_features.budget_optimizations: The design uses multi-functional spaces (e.g., combined living/dining area) and modest finishes to adhere to budget constraints while maintaining quality and aesthetics.
